sentences.en: a response so much out of character that it amazed me.
sentences.cn: 回答与其性格如此不符，使我感到吃惊

sentences.en: A soulless shopping centre stands across from one of the few buildings with character, the town hall.
sentences.cn: 一座毫无生气的购物中心对面就是少有的几个别具特色的建筑物之一：市政厅。

sentences.en: behavior that was totally in character.
sentences.cn: 与特性完全相符的行为

sentences.en: Candida is the most interesting character in the play
sentences.cn: 坎迪达是剧中最有趣的人物。

sentences.en: Candida is the most interesting character in the play.
sentences.cn: 坎迪达是剧中最有趣的人物。

sentences.en: Casey Stengel was probably the most colorful character in baseball.
sentences.cn: 凯西·施滕格尔可能是棒球界最有趣的人物。

sentences.en: Character is not separable from physical form but is governed by it.
sentences.cn: 性格和外表是分不开的，而且观其形知其性。

sentences.en: Children grow up with a mixture of character traits (= character qualities ) from both sides of their family.
sentences.cn: 儿童在成长过程中会把父母亲双方的性格特点都继承下来。

sentences.en: Elizabeth David enthuses about the taste, fragrance and character of Provencal cuisine.
sentences.cn: 伊丽莎白·戴维对普罗旺斯菜肴的色香味津津乐道。

sentences.en: Everyone recognizes Disney’s cartoon characters.
sentences.cn: 迪士尼的卡通人物尽人皆知。

sentences.en: From here on he brings the character confidently alive.
sentences.cn: 从这里开始他真正将这个角色演活了。

sentences.en: He has a cheerful but quiet character.
sentences.cn: 他的性格乐观文静。

sentences.en: He'll be sadly missed. He was a real character.
sentences.cn: 人们会非常怀念他的，他可真是个有趣的人啊。

sentences.en: his temper and other character flaws
sentences.cn: 他的火爆脾气和其他性格缺陷

sentences.en: I didn't know Ron had that much strength of character.
sentences.cn: 我当时不知道罗恩有那么坚强的个性。

sentences.en: Individuality is a valued and inherent part of the British character.
sentences.cn: 个性鲜明是英国人固有的、也是他们看重的特点。

sentences.en: Into her nineties, her thinking remained acute and her character forceful.
sentences.cn: 虽已年届九旬，她依然头脑敏锐，个性很强。

sentences.en: Michael Fish is my favourite. He's a hoot, a real character.
sentences.cn: 我最喜欢迈克尔·菲什。他滑稽逗趣，是个实实在在的人物。

sentences.en: One of the parents was a most obnoxious character. No-one liked him.
sentences.cn: 其中一位家长极为惹人厌，没人喜欢他。

sentences.en: Somewhere deep beneath the surface lay a caring character.
sentences.cn: 在内心深处的某个角落里埋藏着一颗爱心。

sentences.en: the Chinese character for ‘horse’
sentences.cn: 汉字中的“马”

sentences.en: The financial concessions were of a precarious character.
sentences.cn: 财政优惠具有不稳定性。

sentences.en: The island's ruggedness symbolises our history and the character of the people.
sentences.cn: 这个岛屿的凹凸险峻象征着我们的历史和民族性格。

sentences.en: The town itself was full of life and character.
sentences.cn: 这个城市本身充满活力，个性十足。

sentences.en: The whole character of the school has changed.
sentences.cn: 这所学校的特色已经完全变了。

sentences.en: This portrays her as wimpy, but she has a very strong character.
sentences.cn: 这把她描绘得很懦弱，其实她性格十分坚强。

sentences.en: What else could make him behave so out of character?
sentences.cn: 还有什么能让他做出这种如此失常的行为来？

words.tran_cn: 典型的；特有的；表示特性的
无个性的；缺乏特征的；平凡的
在文艺作品中塑造人物；描绘性格
刻划……的性格；表示……的特性
描绘…的特性；具有…的特征

phrases.tran_cn: 一般特征；一般品质；通用字符
符合（不符合）某人的特点
相符的：与某人特性或行为相符的
不相符的：与某人特性或行为不相符的

trans.tran_cn: 性格，特点，特色，勇气，毅力，声望，人物，角色，人，字符，文字，字母
trans.tran_en: the particular combination of qualities that makes someone a particular type of person
